node.name: Action Group
node.description: Sets or gets the status of the selected action group. 1 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom01, 2 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom02, 3 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom03, 4 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom04, 5 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom05, 6 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom06, 7 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom08, 8 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom09, 9 -> KSPActionGroup.Custom10, 10 -> KSPActionGroup.Abort, 11 -> KSPActionGroup.Brakes, 12 -> KSPActionGroup.Gear, 13 -> KSPActionGroup.Light, 14 -> KSPActionGroup.RCS, 15 -> KSPActionGroup.SAS, 16 -> KSPActionGroup.Stage
